article_title: Israeli tanks reach central Rafah as strikes continue
sentence: Western  areas  of  the  city  also  came  under  intense  bombardment  overnight,  residents  said,  despite  international  condemnation  of  an  Israeli  air  strike  and  a  resulting  fire  on  Sunday  that  killed  dozens  of  Palestinians  at  a  tented  camp  for  displaced  people.

article_title: Israeli tanks reach central Rafah as strikes continue
sentence: It  also  denied  reports  from  local  health  and  emergency  services  officials  on  Tuesday  afternoon  that  tank  shells  had  hit  another  camp  in  al-Mawasi,  on  the  coast  west  of  Rafah,  killing  at  least  21  people.

article_title: Israeli tanks reach central Rafah as strikes continue
sentence: One  witness  said  they  saw  soldiers  position  themselves  at  the  top  of  a  building  overlooking  the  roundabout  and  then  begin  to  shoot  at  anyone  who  was  moving.

article_title: Israeli tanks reach central Rafah as strikes continue
sentence: On  Sunday  night,  at  least  45  people  -  more  than  half  of  them  children,  women  and  the  elderly  -  were  killed  when  an  Israeli  air  strike  triggered  a  huge  fire  in  a  camp  for  displaced  people  near  a  UN  logistics  base  in  the  Tal  al-Sultan  area,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Israeli tanks reach central Rafah as strikes continue
sentence: Israel  launched  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza  to  destroy  Hamas  in  response  to  the  group's  cross-border  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  during  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  252  others  were  taken  hostage.

article_title: Israeli tanks reach central Rafah as strikes continue
sentence: At  least  36,090  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
